name: Dating is Hell
description:
Dating is Hell
A cute game about how a magical girl gets kidnapped by her demonic nonbinary nemesis, for what you might ask???

To go on a cute date

This won't end badly
At all~!

Game content contain some triggering material, a list can be found at the following link: Trigger Warnings

Name by @Pitapeeps on twitter

"Come Out and Play" by DesperateMeasurez

Song : 샛별 - Candy Town
Music provided by 샛별.
Link : https://youtu.be/ymsZ5q8f1vk
